meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was campier than the one we saw before.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was campier than usual, with bright colors and bold patterns.
meanings.sent3: The play was so campier that it made everyone in the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The party decorations were campier than a circus, full of glitter and sparkles.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's jokes were campier than a clown's, keeping the audience entertained all night.

meanings.sent1: The costumes in the new movie were campier than those in the original film.
meanings.sent2: The dialogue in the sequel was campier than in the first movie, adding to the humor.
meanings.sent3: The actors embraced the campier style, delivering their lines with exaggerated flair.
meanings.sent4: The music video went for a campier vibe, with over-the-top visuals and costumes.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show featured campier designs, drawing inspiration from retro styles.
